name: Coldheart

skills.name: Flurry of Arrows
skills.description: Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Art of Pain
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 30% chance of placing 50% [Decrease ACC] for 1 turn. Places a 5% [Poison] for 2 turns if target is under [Heal Reduction].

skills.name: Heartseeker
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Fully depletes Turn Meter. Has extra 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit.

offense: Flawless Execution (or Giant Slayer for Clan Boss)

book_priority: A3 (Heartseeker) is the only skill that truly needs books for cooldown/damage.
notes_synergy: 3 copies enable cheese/max HP strategies in Spider, Fire Knight, and other dungeons.
Heartseeker is one of the best single-target boss nukes in the game.
Needs 70% C.RATE for A3, so can focus on C.DMG and ACC.
Very squishy, needs protection or speed to survive.
Synergizes with TM boosters (Renegade, Kymar) and multi-hit teams.
